shows.title: Dave Hill Comedy Show
shows.desc:
New York City-based comedian performs standup comedy, tells important stories and rips sweet guitar solos, while being backed up by a live band he has met only minutes before taking the stage.

Dave Hill is a comedian, writer, musician, and actor based in New York.

shows.title: Sweetcornbread
shows.desc: Cornering the market for compound adjectives like good-time and high-energy, Sweetcornbread are a bunch of friends who throw every style at the wall to see what sticks, all in the name of entertainment. Funk, folk, bluegrass, reggae, punk, rock: you name it, they’ve probably got it covered. This dizzyingly talented combo get the crowds going wherever they pitch up.
